TopicTitle: LLL - Lack Luster Labs - Development Thread

Articles.Content: I must have these parts!
What happened to all the download links removed by request? I love this mod!
I made a nyan Cat bus
Yeah, who's that guy and why did he request LLL taken down? Please put the links back, what makes some guy nobody heard about the right to disable LLL downloads?

Yeah, who's that guy and why did he request LLL taken down? Please put the links back, what makes some guy nobody heard about the right to disable LLL downloads?

You can't be serious.

diomedea's a moderator I believe. I'd speculate that Squad might be planning something for KSC and/or those little yellow utility vehicles that whizz around so Lack's possibly having to pull some stuff. Patience though, that was wild speculation. Doubtless diomedea or Lack will clear this up soon enough.
That'd be a shame if it were true the trucks are one of my favorite parts of stx(that and bonny) I'll have to be sure to take extra care of my copy of the stx truck parts

Quoted over on the release thread....

Diomedea is a moderator (as am I--we have green or blue names). The links were pulled because the files are not in compliance with the new download rules (they lacked licenses in the packages as well as in the OP). I'm sure Lack will reupload compliant versions very shortly though.
Does anyone have Raster Prop setups for these by chance?

Hey all,

Sorry I have been on a bit of a decompression break, had to play another game to get my mojo back. Planet Explorers is Really wicked IMHO anyways,

Built this deep space probe from mostly LLL parts... I am going to launch in a minute.

I have not messed with the angled cargo ramp, I think that somewhere along the lines I may have miss placed what lack sent me. I will send him an email and have him kick it back over and I will see.
I need this i miss it so much
ALL downloads are gone.Let's check out my about-to-be-deleted 0.23.5 KSP and scavenge what we can.

I think it has something to do with the copyright crap since all the downloads have gone and some don't have the vehicles (I think)

Edited August 27, 2014 by montyben101

New forum rules dictate you need to supply a license with the downloaded files, for your mod and any bundled dependencies, it's a legal thing, means all old mods that don't supply a license are effectively EOL.

Well on the forums and curse anyway.

I hate this legal crap. License in the pack, in the thread, where else? Maybe in the part description? Bohemia Interactive somehow doesn't do that and despite this, ArmA has just as good modding scene as KSP (if a bit harder to get into. ArmA is very complex).

Ok guys I have the files with the added HTM file for creative commons 4, which is what Lack stated he wanted to upgrade too. He is busy so he will have to update the OP with 100% correct files, but this is what I had archived.

OP Updated, links redundant...

thanks for looking at this post!

Edited August 29, 2014 by MrWizerd

-hedge of text-

yay! now people can download this stuff again!

I hate this legal crap. License in the pack, in the thread, where else? Maybe in the part description? Bohemia Interactive somehow doesn't do that and despite this, ArmA has just as good modding scene as KSP (if a bit harder to get into. ArmA is very complex).

The licenses like squads requirement that a mods sourcecode be published are important both to protect the modder from those who would poach their work for profit or to push malware and to protect users who are looking to leverage code and art assets from other mods because they lack the time or manpower to do it all themselves its what has let many mods out live their authors involvement in the community especially in this post-kerbalspaceport age of ours.

Links are back up, with licences; apologies for the downtime, ether-net cable turned out to be the problem in the end.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Working on an updated cockpit for the Kossak, and there's a pic of the ramp for the An-225.
Nice. Looking forward to the new SXT.

Awesome work on Kn-225. Really my favourite cockpit.

So I was wondering if you can add some fuel to the things that are attached to the end of it.

Why does the train take forever to start?

My best guess? It's a HypeTrain Mk6 (They were yellow hypediesel locos. Mine was destroyed by a creeper pack sent by a terrorist on the train duing 0.24 hype. [yes, that happened in the chat] Luckily I carry the Mk5 HypeLoco, a good ol' LMS Black Five, and I have replaced the old diesel. First time I got up to plaidic velocity with a HypeSteam engine.) and the Kerbals aren't hyped enough for it to start until after an announcement occurs.

Links are back up, with licences; apologies for the downtime, ether-net cable turned out to be the problem in the end.

Working on an updated cockpit for the Kossak, and there's a pic of the ramp for the An-225.

That is a great cockpit. I look forward to seeing SXT updated.

Where's the download to the darkened 1.25m fuel tank? It makes the 3.75 meter tanks darker as well.

I really want a standalone mount KR-1 and KS-25. http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/87174-KR-1-and-KS-25-on-a-1-25m-base-High-Gimbal-Engines
